price: ហើយការវិនាសអន្ដរាយ គឺសម្រាប់ពួកដែលប្រឆាំងនឹង ថ្ងៃដែលពួកគេត្រូវបានគេសន្យា។
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimu alladhī yūʿadūna
